[ti:Smile]
[00:15.85]If there's a reason or not
[00:18.70]Smile today, smile now
[00:23.31]Tomorrow won't be time
[00:26.11]Smile 'cause you can
[00:30.82]Tomorrow can be a better day

[00:38.17]We always can smile again
[00:41.17]Tomorrow gonna be a better day
[00:46.12]Show me that big smile
[00:48.57]Your eyes full of love
[00:53.17]Uncover your face
[00:56.07]Please show them
